features: Retractable Design: Easy to use, click to open/close. The satisfying click response makes it a great way to relieve stress and spark inspiration.

Smooth Writing: The Linfanc gel ink pens write smoothly and consistently with fine point 0.5mm vivid black ink. The quick-drying and smudge-free black ink keeps pages clean and neat. Friendly to left handed writing.

Aesthetic Pen: 6 pack aesthetic pens with beautiful colors and creative design are super soft and comfortable in the hand. Great for home school office supplies. The prefect gift for family/ friends/ coworkers/ holidays.
Practical Pocket Clip: The pocket clip with little steel ball design can be easily attached to notebooks pockets and binders. Also, the little steel ball on the clip is very entertaining to spin.
Satisfaction Guarantee: Please feel free to contact us if you have any issues with the product. Linfanc offers lifetime technical support and 90 days money-back guarantee.
body.description: Product Specifications: Package Includes: 6 pcs gel ink pens Line Point: Fine point 0.5mm Ink Color: All black ink Pen Barrel Color: Morandi series with elegant black, space gray, grayish green, smog pink, haze blue, and starlight yellow Length: 5 3/4" ( 147mm ) Diameter: 3/8" ( 10mm ) Weigh: 9/16 oz ( 16g ) The Length of Pen Refill: 4 3/8" ( 110mm ) Note: Please completely remove the red wax ball on the pen tip before first writing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite pens!
reviews.reviewText: I am loving writing with these new pens.First of all, the colors are so pretty and they fit my minimalistic aesthetic if that's what you're into! These pens also have a nice grip to them and I LOVE the feel of them. The feeling is so smooth and I love how the pens have a matte finish. I also love the small little ball on the clip of the pen- I love to fidget with it and it is so satisfying.Writing with these pens is so enjoyable. It is so smooth and fun to write with. The ink dries pretty quickly as the description says which is really nice because I find it hard to write with other gel pens because they don't dry as quick. Adding onto that, these pens don't smear when you highlight!! I use these pens for school and I often have to highlight so these pens are great! I love the fact that these pens don't bleed through paper at all as well.Overall these pens are high quality and I'd recommend these to anyone who does a lot of writing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these pens!! They’re soft to the touch and they write very well. The ink doesn’t smear. Love the pretty colors of the pens and they have crisp black ink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hands off my pen!
reviews.reviewText: Have you ever heard the jokes/stereotypes about nurses and their pens? In my case they’re totally true.I’m territorial about my pens. And super picky.When the job is rough, you hold to little joys where you can find them and for me, one of those joys is a good pen.A good pen must be comfortable to hold. Nothing clunky or awkward. It has to be fine-tipped and write smoothly, but not so fine-tipped that it pokes holes through whatever you’re writing on. It can’t dry up after only a few uses. And NO LIDS. They just get in the way, fall on the floor (in the hospital the floor is lava—you don’t want things to fall there), or get lost.Bonus points if it looks nice and is affordable, too!These pens check all the boxes! They’re so nice that every time I let someone borrow my pen (while watching like a hawk to make sure I get it back, of course), they always end up saying, “oooh, this is a nice pen!”The fine tip enables me to write really small notes on my handoff report sheets without it looking like a giant ink smear. Nice and crisp!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE LOVE LOVE!
reviews.reviewText: This was the best purchase I’ve gotten so far! Love how easy they are to hold and they write super fine! Sometimes ink doesn’t come out but that does get fixed with more writing. The colors are beautiful as well. There is no smearing either!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These pens are super cute and I love the way they write for the most part. A lot of times the ink cuts out when I’m making any letter with a rounded edge, like e or o or d, etc. That’s my only complaint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I never write reviews however as a nurse, I'm serious about my pens and having good ones for my shift. I found these pens and just WOW. These are absolutely amazing and write so well. I love how soft they are to hold and how they have a bit of weight to them. I definitely recommend these pens, if you're iffy about it.. buy them! You won't regret it at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Mixed Results - Decent Pens, But Ink Skipping Issues
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a set of pens, and while they have their merits, I must admit that I had mixed results with them. Let me share my experience, starting with the positive aspects.First and foremost, the design and build quality of these pens are quite impressive. The sleek and ergonomic design offers a comfortable grip, allowing for long writing sessions without any discomfort. The pen's body feels sturdy, and the retractable mechanism functions smoothly, ensuring convenience and ease of use.Additionally, the ink flow, when it works properly, is consistent and vibrant. The pens produce clean lines with a fine point, making them suitable for both writing and precise detailing. The range of colors included in the set is also a nice touch, adding a touch of creativity to my notes and projects.However, the main drawback I encountered with these pens was their tendency to skip or have intermittent ink flow. It was frustrating to find that, occasionally, the ink would refuse to flow smoothly onto the paper, resulting in uneven and broken lines. This inconsistency was not limited to a single pen in the set but seemed to be a recurring issue across multiple pens.While the skipping issue wasn't constant, it occurred frequently enough to be noticeable and hamper the overall writing experience. I tried various techniques, such as applying different pressure and angles, to alleviate the problem, but unfortunately, the results were hit or miss.Considering the price point of these pens, I had expected better performance and more reliable ink flow. It's disappointing to encounter such inconsistency, as it disrupts the smooth flow of thoughts and hampers the overall quality of my work.In conclusion, the set of pens I purchased had both positive and negative aspects. The pens boast an appealing design, comfortable grip, and vibrant ink when they work properly. However, the persistent issue of ink skipping detracts from their overall functionality and reliability. If you're willing to take a chance on occasional ink flow issues, these pens might be worth considering, but I would recommend exploring other options if you require consistent and uninterrupted writing performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars TOP 5 BEST PENS
reviews.reviewText: I used to love using Pentel 0.7mm pens and these are up there on my list. I love how sleek they look and write really good. I'm not sure if they have any other colors but I would love more colors other than black ink. But I will for sure recommend if you work in a office or office space where you write a lot

If you're looking for beautiful, aesthetically pleasing pens that won't bleed through your paper, these are the ones. I got them for my sister for Christmas and she loves them!! So I'll be ordering them for myself now too

reviews.reviewTitle: You have to love a good pen

I use these pens for. Nursing and love them so much! So aesthetically pleasing and they don’t smudge
Look exactly as pictures. Very smooth writing.
